page.title: 08Chatfield C.P. School
page.content: Our school opened in 1981.We only had 32 children at first,now we have 202 children and ten teachers.Before the school was built there used to be a farm,then in the war there was an ordnance factory.All that is left is the big oak tree in our playground.We have the tree on our school badge. We have seven classes and the children are from 5-11 years old.We have gerbils,hamsters and guinea pigs in school and we help to care for them.The school is open-plan and we have wet areas for painting.Sometimes we go out to visit museums and other interesting places.Some children go on School Venture Holidays.This year 28 children went to Burwardsley Outdoor Education Centre for three days.We have a School Bank.We have Football,Netball,Rounders and Cricket teams.
